src_original: ihāryaśrāvakaḥ saṃgham ākārataḥ samanusmarati /  supratipanno bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgha iti + + + + + + + +
bahavaḥ śaraṇaṃ yānti parvatāni vanāni ca /
ārāmāṃ vṛkṣacaityāṃś ca manuṣyā bhayatarjitāḥ /  6 na hy etac charaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ naitac charaṇam uttamaṃ naitac charaṇam āgamya sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate /
yas tu buddhaṃca dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
